scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Loan Application Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive applicant data (income, credit score) from a publicly accessible loan application scoring model using a model inversion attack.  The actor aims to gain an unfair advantage in the loan application process or to sell the reconstructed data for profit.
initial_goal: Infer applicant income and credit score ranges from the loan application scoring API.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A competitor is attempting to gain an unfair advantage by reverse-engineering a bank's loan application scoring model.  The model uses anonymized applicant data, but the adversary seeks to infer individual characteristics. The scoring model is accessed via a publicly available API.
